mapper.select: select product.prodNo, product.userNo, product.prodSelect, product.prodSubject, product.prodSale, product.prodName, product.prodPrice, product.prodHitCount, product.prodHeart, product.prodQuality, product.prodCreated, product.prodAddr, product.prodTrade, product.prodContent, productTm.tmImg from product inner join productTm on product.prodNo = productTm.prodNo where product.prodNo=#{prodNo}
mapper.update: update product set prodHitCount= prodHitCount+1 where prodNo =#{prodNo}
mapper.select: select userId from users where userNo=#{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into review (prodNo, userNo, reviewNo, reviewContent, reviewIpAddr, reviewGroupNo, reviewDepth, reviewOrderNo, reviewParent, reviewCreated) values (#{prodNo},#{userNo}, #{reviewNo},#{reviewContent}, #{reviewIpAddr}, #{reviewGroupNo}, #{reviewDepth}, #{reviewOrderNo}, #{reviewParent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from review where prodNo=#{prodNo} order by reviewNo
select count(*) from review where prodNo=#{prodNo}
select nvl(count(*),0) from heart where prodNo = #{prodNo} and heartCheck = 1
mapper.insert: insert into heart (prodNo, userNo, heartNo, heartCheck) values (#{prodNo}, #{userNo}, #{heartNo}, 1)
mapper.update: update heart set heartCheck = #{heartCheck} where prodNo=#{prodNo} and userNo=#{userNo}
mapper.select: select heartCheck from heart where prodNo = #{prodNo} and userNo=#{userNo}
select count(*) from heart where prodNo = #{prodNo} and userNo=#{userNo}
